title: 全国新作花火挑战杯2025
location: 长野县诏访市诏访湖上
locationEn: Lake Suwa, Suwa City, Nagano Prefecture
description: 6年来首次重新举办的全国新作花火竞技大会，采用预选4回、决赛1回的分散举办方式。全国选拔的20名烟火师将以"色彩优秀、华丽"为主题进行竞技。
descriptionEn: The National New Fireworks Challenge Cup, held for the first time in 6 years, features a distributed format with 4 preliminary rounds and 1 final. 20 selected pyrotechnicians from across Japan compete with the theme of "excellent and gorgeous colors".

access.train: JR中央本线上诏访站步行8分钟
access.trainEn: JR Chuo Main Line Kami-Suwa Station, 8 minutes walk
access.car: 中央自动车道诏访IC约15分钟
access.carEn: Chuo Expressway Suwa IC, about 15 minutes

viewingSpots.name: 诏访湖湖畔公园
viewingSpots.description: 最佳观赏地点，可欣赏湖面倒影
viewingSpots.descriptionEn: Best viewing spot with lake reflections

contact.name: 新作花火大会实行委员会（诏访观光协会内）
contact.nameEn: New Fireworks Competition Executive Committee (Suwa Tourism Association)

weather.note: 雨天决行（台风・灾害时延期）
weather.noteEn: Held rain or shine (postponed in case of typhoon or disaster)

history.description: 诏访湖拥有全国屈指可数的花火打上场所和观览场所。以此诏访湖为舞台，全国有志的烟火师以不拘泥于传统框架的崭新发想和独创技术，创作艺术性极高的新作花火进行竞技的大会。
history.descriptionEn: Lake Suwa boasts one of the finest fireworks launch and viewing locations in Japan. Using this lake as a stage, ambitious pyrotechnicians from across the nation compete with highly artistic new fireworks created through innovative ideas and original techniques that break free from traditional frameworks.
